alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Cumberland; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; Louisa; Powhatan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 6:29PM EDT until June 26 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Louisa County in central Virginia... Northeastern Cumberland County in central Virginia... Goochland County in central Virginia... Southwestern Caroline County in north central Virginia... Northwestern Henrico County in central Virginia... Northwestern Hanover County in central Virginia... Northern Powhatan County in central Virginia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 629 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mineral to near Hadensville to Lakeside Village, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Gum Spring around 635 PM EDT. Bumpass around 645 PM EDT. Montpelier around 655 PM EDT. Goochland around 700 PM EDT. Oilville around 715 PM EDT. Ashland, Randolph Macon College and Sabot around 720 PM EDT. Kings Dominion and Manakin around 725 PM EDT. Wyndham around 730 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Chilesburg, Orchid, Golansville, Crozier, Rock Castle, Vontay, Maidens, Gum Tree, Three Square and Irwin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; Cumberland; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; Louisa; Powhatan
